content.title: Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia
content.definition: Immune-mediated platelet activation causing thrombocytopenia and paradoxical thrombosis from heparin exposure.
content.statement: Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Hit that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
